sections.Biography:
==="[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"===
Hugh is present during the speech [[Frostfinger]] gives to the "graduating" recruits. Hugh is assigned to the Rangers.<ref>"[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"</ref>
